sen.j: 新間之町通（しんあいのまちどおり）は京都市内の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Shinai-no-machi-doori street is one of the streets running from north to south in Kyoto City.
Shinai-no-machi-doori street is a street running from north - south through Kyoto City.
Shin Ainomachi-dori Street is a street running from north - south through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 鴨川 (淀川水系)の東、左京区の二条通と仁王門通の間の１区画のみの短い通り。
sen.e: Shinai-no-machi-doori street is a short street spanning over only one block in the east of Kamo River (in Yodo River system) between Nijo-doori street and Niomon-doori street in Sakyo Ward.
Shinai-no-machi-doori street is a short street spanning only one block in the east of Kamo River (in Yodo River system) between Nijo-doori street and Niomon-doori street in Sakyo Ward.
Shin Ainomachi-dori Street is a short street spanning only one block in the east of the Kamo-gawa River (in Yodo-gawa River system) between Nijo-dori Street and Niomon-dori Street in Sakyo Ward.
sen.cmt: Shin Ainomachi-dori Street, Kamo-gawa River, Yodo-gawa River, Nijo-dori Street, Niomon-dori Streetとしました。"Kamo-gawa River"→"the Kamo-gawa River"に変更しました。

sen.j: 南の延長は新堺町通と名前が変わる。
sen.e: The southward extended portion of Shinai-no-machi-doori street has a different name, Shinsakaicho-doori street.
The southward extended portion of Shinai-no-machi-doori street has a different name, Shinsakaicho-doori street.
The southward extended portion of Shin Ainomachi-dori Street has a different name, Shin Sakaimachi-dori Street.
sen.cmt: Shin Ainomachi-dori Streetとし、Shinsakaicho-doori street→Shin Sakaimachi-dori Streetに修正

sen.e: Many pieces of machiya (a type of residences and stores in the central part of a city) line Shinai-no-machi-doori street.
Many pieces of machiya (a type of residence or store in the central part of a city) line Shinai-no-machi-doori street.
Many pieces of machiya (a type of residence or store in the central part of a city) line Shin Ainomachi-dori Street.

sen.j: 京都御所の拡張により間之町通の丸太町通以北の住民が（当時新開地であった）鴨川の東の現在地に移住したためにこの名が付いた。
sen.e: The name, Shinai-no-machi-doori street was given because the residents living in an area along and in the north of Marutamacih-doori street along Ai-no-machi-doori street moved to the current site which was in the east of Kamo River (and which was a newly developed area) due to the expansion of the Imperial Palace in Kyoto.

The name, Shinai-no-machi-doori street was given because the residents living in an area along and in the north of Marutamacih-doori street along Ai-no-machi-doori street moved to the current site which was in the east of Kamo River (and which was a newly developed area) due to the Imperial Palace's expansion in Kyoto.

The name, Shin Ainomachi-dori Street was given because the residents living in an area along and in the north of Marutamacih-dori Street along Ainomachi-dori Street moved to the current site which was in the east of Kamo-gawa River (and which was a newly developed area) due to the Imperial Palace's expansion in Kyoto.
sen.cmt: Shin Ainomachi-dori Street, Marutamacih-dori Street, Ainomachi-dori Street, Kamo-gawa Riverとしました。
